fr.umlv.jphoto
Interface TransitionConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
Slide
public interface TransitionConfig

Object that contains all properties used to initialize a transition.

Author:
remi
See Also:
Transition.init(TransitionConfig)

Method Summary
 java.awt.Dimension getAnimationDimension()
          returns the screen size of the animation.
 java.awt.Image getDestinationImage()
          returns the destination image.
 long getDuration()
          returns the total duration of the transition.
 java.awt.Image getSourceImage()
          returns the source image.
 

Method Detail

getSourceImage

java.awt.Image getSourceImage()
returns the source image. This is the first frame of the transition.

Returns:
the source image that can't be null.

getDestinationImage

java.awt.Image getDestinationImage()
returns the destination image. This is the last frame of the transition.

Returns:
the destination image that can't be null.

getDuration

long getDuration()
returns the total duration of the transition.

Returns:
the duration in millisecond.

getAnimationDimension

java.awt.Dimension getAnimationDimension()
returns the screen size of the animation.

Returns:
a dimension containing the size of the animation.
